TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProxyElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: Identifies the configuration settings for Web proxy server. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows the configuration attributes of the [\<proxy\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3Cproxy%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md) configuration element to which this class corresponds.
|Element|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`proxyaddress`|A URI that identifies the Web proxy server to use.| |`bypassonlocal`|Determines whether the Web proxy is bypassed for local resources.| |`usesystemdefault`|Controls whether the Internet Explorer Web proxy settings are used.| |`useDefaultCredentialsForScriptDownload`|Controls whether default credentials are used when accessing the configuration script.| |`scriptDownloadInterval`|Specifies the number of seconds that elapse before the configuration script is refreshed.| |`scriptDownloadTimeout`|Specifies the number of seconds allowed for the configuration script to be downloaded.| |`useDefaultCredentials`|Controls whether default credentials are used when accessing the Web proxy.|
This class is used to specify and configure the Web proxy server to use for requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes.
This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets an <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues> value that controls whether the Web proxy is automatically detected.
Docs.value: <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues> if the is automatically detected; <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues> if the is not automatically detected; or <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether local resources are retrieved by using a Web proxy server.
Docs.value:
A <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.BypassOnLocalValues>.
Avalue that indicates whether local resources are retrieved by using a Web proxy server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This configuration element controls whether requests for resources on the LAN are sent to the proxy server or sent directly to the host where the resource resides.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URI that identifies the Web proxy server to use.
Gets or sets an <xref:System.Uri> value that specifies the location of the automatic proxy detection script.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Uri> specifying the location of the automatic proxy detection script.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that controls whether the Internet Explorer Web proxy settings are used.
Docs.value: if the Internet Explorer LAN settings are used to detect and configure the default used for requests; otherwise, .
